sections.heading: to 43-1A-12 - Recompiled.
sections.text: Recompilations.— Sections 43-1A-1 to 43-1A-12 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1984, Chapter 100, have been recompiled as 28-16-1 to 28-16-12 NMSA 1978. Sections 28-16-1 to 28-16-12 NMSA 1978 were repealed by Laws 1993, ch. 50, § 19. For present comparable provisions,see28-16A-1 to 28-16A-18 NMSA 1978.
